item.description:
We will continue to discuss the new issue of What is Enlightenment magazine, which profiles Ken, particularly his theory of Integral Spirituality. Please buy the issue, read up, and come prepared for great discussion...
http://www.wie.org/j3...


At Samadhi Yoga.
Potluck: bring some food to share.

If you take the T, it's the Newton Center T-stop, about 2 minute walk to the studio. Newton Center is on the D-branch of the Green Line. The studio is just above and to the right of Pier 1 on Beacon St.

For more information, see http://www.samadhiyog...
item.name: Boston Ken Wilber Group July Meetup
